All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Advanced
    This class extends the Machine class, evaluates the shortest path, and first seeks to obstruct the opponent's path.
    Allied
    This wall's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal wall, except it allows to pass to the player who put the wall.
    Beginner
    his class extends the Machine class and exhibits random behavior, in which it will either place a wall or advance randomly
    Board
    A board class that represents the object displayed in the interface and the environment in which the game is played
    BoardGUI
    This class contains the board, along with the information and actions of the game.
    CirclePanel
    This class draws a circle on the panel
    DefeatScreen
    Create the defeat screen
    DoubleTurn
    This square's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal square, except it steals a turn
    GameDifficultyGUI
    Create the screen where the player decides which type of machine will play
    GameModeGUI
    Create the screen where the player decides the game mode
    GameModeObserver
    this class represents the game mode pbservers
    Grafo
    The Grafo class represents an undirected weighted graph.
    Human
    The Human class represents a human player in a game.
    Intermediate
    The class intermediate extends Machine.
    Log  
    LongWall
    This wall's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal wall, except it has a length of 3 squares.
    Machine
    This players's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal player, except it calculates a determinated strategy to play against the player
    Mode
    An abstract class representing a game mode in Quoridor.
    NormalMode
    This Mode's subclass has the behavior of a normal mode, with no time conditions
    NormalSquare
    This square's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal square.
    NormalWall
    This wall's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal wall.
    Persistence
    this class is the persistence of the game
    Player
    An abstract class representing a player in the Quoridor game.
    PlayerInfoGUI
    Create the player information of walls, name and color section
    Quoridor
    This class represents a Quoridor game.
    QuoridorGUI
    This class communicates with the controller and contains the game's JFrame.
    QuoriPOOB
    This class is the controller between the domain and the presentation.
    QuoriPOOBException
    The exceptions for the game
    Return
    This square's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal square, except it returns the token two move if possible
    RoundBorder
    Create a panel with round border
    SetUpGameGUI
    Create the screen where the player configurates the game
    Square
    Create a square.
    SquareGUI
    Create the component of the squares in the board and the walls
    StartGUI
    Create the screen where the player decides how many players will the game have
    Teleporter
    This square's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal square, except it allows the token to move around regardless of walls (including diagonal movements)
    Temporary
    This wall's subclass has the same behaviors that a normal wall, except it after 4 turns, the wall is removed form the board
    Timed  
    TimeObserver
    this class represents the time observers
    TimeTrial  
    Token  
    TurnTimerTask
    this class represents the actions to be executed during a player's turn
    VictoryScreen
    Create the victory screen
    Wall
    Create a wall.
